001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.service;
002
003import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
004import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
005import androidx.room.Database;
006import androidx.room.RoomDatabase;
007import androidx.room.TypeConverter;
008import androidx.room.TypeConverters;
009import androidx.sqlite.db.SupportSQLiteDatabase;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.dao.ScoreDao;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.dao.UserDao;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.Score;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.User;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.pojo.UserScore;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.service.GravityDatabase.Converters;
016import java.time.Instant;
017
018/**
019 * Defines a connection to a local Room/SQLite database, All database reads/writes are performed
020 * using data-access object (DAO) instances obtained from the singleton instance of this class.
021 */
022
023@Database(
024    entities = {User.class, Score.class},
025    views = {UserScore.class},
026    version = 1
027)
028
029@TypeConverters(Converters.class)
030
031public abstract class GravityDatabase extends RoomDatabase {
032
033  public static final String NAME = "gravity_scores";
034
035
036  public abstract UserDao getUserDao();
037
038  public abstract ScoreDao getScoreDao();
039
040  public static class Converters {
041
042    @TypeConverter
043    @Nullable
044    public static Long toLong(@Nullable Instant value) {
045      return (value != null) ? value.toEpochMilli() : null;
046    }
047
048    @TypeConverter
049    @Nullable
050    public static Instant toInstant(@Nullable Long value) {
051      return (value != null) ? Instant.ofEpochMilli(value) : null;
052    }
053  }
054
055  public static class Callback extends RoomDatabase.Callback {
056
057    @Override
058    public void onCreate(@NonNull SupportSQLiteDatabase db) {
059      super.onCreate(db);
060    }
061  }
062}
